Line 3: Line 3:
There are many [[waterfall]]s in the [[Himalayas]] that are mighty tall and are fed by the numerous streams and glaciers but unlike the waterfalls from the [[Western Ghats]] they are not quite popular.
There are many [[waterfall]]s in the [[Himalayas]] that are mighty tall and are fed by the numerous streams and glaciers but unlike the waterfalls from the [[Western Ghats]] they are not quite popular.
'''Amitabh Bachchan falls''' lies on the road connecting [[Chungthang]] to [[Yumthang Valley]] in [[North Sikkim district]] of [[Sikkim]].
'''Amitabh Bachchan falls''' lies on the road connecting [[Chungthang]] to [[Yumthang Valley]] in [[North Sikkim district]] of [[Sikkim]].
â   â
[[File:Amitabhfalls.jpg]]
 
It is certainly the tallest of the many waterfalls shown to [[tourist]]s by local tour operators and cab-drivers-cum-guide.
It is certainly the tallest of the many waterfalls shown to [[tourist]]s by local tour operators and cab-drivers-cum-guide.
